title.rendered: Former spy Aliia Roza is digging deeper into seduction on Gossip Stone TV

content.rendered:
Award-winning Former Secret Agent Aliia Roza is digging deeper into seduction in her reality TV show on Gossip Stone TV

Seduce Like A Spy, Aliia Roza’s new reality TV show, is educational and fun and features techniques and examples of manipulation and seduction from the world around us. The show’s first goal is to teach the viewers how to avoid becoming a victim of manipulation and seduction and will feature interviews with victims and experts, con men, manipulators, and their targets.

Why do people manipulate others? Money? Power? Pleasure? Control? In a word – yes – all this and more. 

With a full social life, Aliia is a woman empowerment activist and appears often on red carpets and top events. She received an award in 2019 and 2022 during the Cannes Festival from Forbes Magazine and by World Influencers and Blogger Awards.

In 2018 Aliia was appointed ambassador of the respected Best Beginnings Charity which has British Royal Family patronage in London, and due to her excellent work was invited to charity events in Buckingham palace where she met King Charles III in 2019. 

While attending the prestigious 79th International Venice Film Festival, Aliia also received an award at a lavish awards ceremony for her activism and coaching work helping young women around the world become successful entrepreneurs.

Seduce Like a Spy reality TV show breaks down the mechanics of seduction. By interviewing influencers and celebrity guests, Aliia Roza will be giving her audience a taste of her former life behind the veil of secrecy. 

Gossip Stone TV is an American celebrity reality TV channel, launching on Roku TV, Amazon Fire TV and Apple TV with over 150 million households worldwide.

The show’s first goal is to teach […]
